directions: Stir lemon-lime drink mix and sugar together in a large punch bowl.
Pour cold water and pineapple juice into the sugar mixture; stir until sugar and drink mix have dissolved. Slowly pour in ginger ale and gently stir.
Float scoops of lime sherbet in the punch just before serving.
ingredients: 2 (0.13 ounce) packages unsweetened lemon-lime flavored drink mix (such as KOOL-AID®)
1 (46 fluid ounce) can unsweetened pineapple juice
title: Evergreen Punch
